title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja, seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew explore the Grand Line in search of the ultimate treasure, the One Piece.

title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: In a world where humanity lives in fear of giant humanoid creatures called Titans, Eren Yeager vows to eradicate them.

title: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: Izuku Midoriya, a boy born without superpowers in a world full of them, dreams of becoming a hero.

title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: Light Yagami finds a mysterious notebook that grants him the power to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister, who has been turned into a demon.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
author: Sui Ishida
description: Ken Kaneki, a college student, becomes a half-ghoul after an encounter with one, and must navigate the dangerous world of ghouls and humans.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, use alchemy to search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed experiment.

title: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the powers of a Soul Reaper and must protect the living world from evil spirits and guide souls to the afterlife.

title: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: Goku, a Saiyan warrior, embarks on adventures to find the Dragon Balls and protect Earth from powerful foes.
